name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: El Pirato - Quality Torrent Search Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pirate bay quality torrent search bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
El Pirato - Quality Torrent Search Tool works as a support tool for searching content from multiple Pirate Bay mirrors. It focuses solely on providing descriptions and magnet links that serve as addresses to the content distributed as torrents.

The team will continuously upgrade the tool to provide the best possible service. It is also within the team's plans to introduce additional features in the future.
